event.name: Age of Dragons
event.desc: The Age of Dragons has arrived! Dragons are more powerful than ever!

event.name: World Awakening
event.desc: The World Awakening is upon us! Elementals are more powerful than ever!

event.name: Rise of the Frogs
event.desc: The time has come for the Frogs to rise up and fight! Frogs gain superior protection!

event.name: Age of Dragons
event.desc: The Age of Dragons has arrived! Dragons are more powerful than ever!

event.name: Iceshatter Barrier
event.desc: Winter has arrived! Creatures with Barrier are mystically enhanced with frost magic!

event.name: Rise of the Dead
event.desc: The Undead have risen and are more relentless than ever before!

event.name: Celestial Legion
event.desc: Skyhaven's Angels have formed a mighty army of warriors to lead your heroes to victory!

event.name: Surge of Elements
event.desc: Primal energy surges through the world! Elementals are more powerful than ever!

event.name: Poisonbolt Evolution
event.desc: A newly unearthed magic has given Frogs the ability to become more poisonous!

event.name: Airborne Mastery
event.desc: Avians now feel a surge of power when facing intimidating foes!

event.name: Age of Dragons
event.desc: The Age of Dragons has arrived! Dragons are more powerful than ever!

event.name: Hardened Carapace
event.desc: Insects have discovered how to fortify their outer shell and are more resilient than ever!

event.name: Celestial Legion
event.desc: Skyhaven's Angels have formed a mighty army of warriors to lead your heroes to victory!

event.name: Surge of Elements
event.desc: Primal energy surges through the world! Elementals are more powerful than ever!

event.name: Rise of the Dead
event.desc: The Undead have risen and are more relentless than ever before!

event.name: Goblin's Anarchy
event.desc: Each active Goblin throws a number of bombs equal to their base Attack at the start of each turn before other skills. Each bomb deals 1 damage.

event.name: Age of Dragons
event.desc: The Age of Dragons has arrived! Dragons are more powerful than ever!

event.name: Poisonbolt Evolution
event.desc: A newly unearthed magic has given Frogs the ability to become more poisonous!

event.name: Underwater Shelter
event.desc: Seafolk dive beneath the water's surface, protecting them from harmful attacks!

event.name: Eagle Eye
event.desc: Each Avian marks a random target upon first activation, Hexing them for 30% of the Avian's base Attack. The Avian chooses a new mark when their current mark dies. Ignores Invisibility.

event.name: Celestial Legion
event.desc: Skyhaven's Angels have formed a mighty army of warriors to lead your heroes to victory!

event.name: Undead Unearthed
event.desc: The Undead are rising, attracting armies of skeletons to the battlefield to aid them in combat!

event.name: Age of Dragons
event.desc: The Age of Dragons has arrived! Dragons are more powerful than ever!

event.name: Surge of Elements
event.desc: Primal energy surges through the world! Elementals have their Attack increased by 75% of their base!

event.name: Insectile Venom
event.desc: Insects have risen with a new type of toxin! All Insects gain the new skill Venom equal to 10% of their Health!

event.name: Goblin's Anarchy
event.desc: Each active Goblin throws a number of bombs equal to their base Attack at the start of each turn before other skills. Each bomb deals 1 damage.

event.name: Underwater Shelter
event.desc: Seafolk dive beneath the water's surface, protecting them from harmful attacks while they are on delay!

event.name: Poisonbolt Evolution
event.desc: A newly unearthed magic has given Frogs the ability to become more poisonous!

event.name: Energy Shield
event.desc: All Mechas have upgraded their protective protocols, gaining a Barrier equal to their base Attack each time they deal Attack damage.

event.name: Rise of the Dead
event.desc: The Undead have risen and are more relentless than ever before!

event.name: Eagle Eye
event.desc: Each Avian marks a random target upon first activation, Hexing them for 30% of the Avian's base Attack. The Avian chooses a new mark when their current mark dies. Ignores Invisibility.

event.name: Elemental Conflux
event.desc: Elementals gain abilities based on faction! Aether have their Attack increased by 50% of the base, Chaos gain Vengeance equal to 50% of base Attack, and Wyld gain an additional 25% base Health!

event.name: Angelic Assault
event.desc: Angels have transcended, gaining Legion equal to 15% of their base Health!

event.name: Age of Dragons
event.desc: Dragons feel the primal call of the world, granting them Scorch equal to 20% of their base HP!

event.name: Goblin's Anarchy
event.desc: Each active Goblin throws a number of bombs equal to their base Attack at the start of each turn before other skills. Each bomb deals 1 damage.

event.name: Energy Ward
event.desc: All Mechas have upgraded their protective protocols, gaining Ward equal to 3 plus 10% of their base Health.

event.name: Brine Edge
event.desc: Seafolk harness the power of the ocean, increasing their Attack by 15% of their base Health!

event.name: Venom
event.desc: Insects have risen with a new type of toxin! All Insects gain the new skill Venom equal to 1 plus 15% of their base Health!

event.name: Poisonhide
event.desc: When a Frog is damaged by an attack, it deals Poison damage to the attacker equal to 5 plus 10% of the Frogs's base Health.

event.name: Eyes in the Sky
event.desc: Each Avian marks a random target upon first activation, Hexing them for 15% of their base Health. The Avian chooses a new mark when their current mark dies. Ignores Invisibility.

event.name: Elemental Conflux
event.desc: Elementals gain abilities based on faction! Aether have their Attack increased by 50% of the base, Chaos gain Vengeance equal to 50% of base Attack, and Wyld gain an additional 25% base Health!

event.name: Rise of the Dead
event.desc: The Undead have risen and are more relentless than ever before, giving them Berserk equal to 15% of their base Health!

event.name: Age of Dragons
event.desc: Dragons feel the primal call of the world, granting them Scorch equal to 20% of their base HP!

event.name: Energy Ward
event.desc: All Mechas have upgraded their protective protocols, gaining Ward equal to 3 plus 10% of their base Health.

event.name: Angelic Assault
event.desc: Angels have transcended, gaining Legion equal to 15% of their base Health!

event.name: Goblin's Anarchy
event.desc: Each active Goblin throws a number of bombs equal to their base Attack at the start of each turn before other skills. Each bomb deals 1 damage.

event.name: Underwater Shelter
event.desc: Seafolk dive beneath the water's surface, protecting them from harmful attacks while they are on delay!

event.name: Elemental Conflux
event.desc: Elementals gain abilities based on faction! Aether have their Attack increased by 50% of the base, Chaos gain Vengeance equal to 50% of base Attack, and Wyld gain an additional 25% base Health!

event.name: Insect Swarm
event.desc: After dealing Attack damage, permanently increases Attack of the lowest Attack active non-tower ally creature by 20% of the Attacker's base Health.

event.name: Undead Vampirism
event.desc: Deals damage to opposing creature and then heals self, even while on delay. Damage and heal are equal to 5% plus 3 of the card’s base Health. This damage cannot be increased.

event.name: Lily & Spear Formation
event.desc: Frogs deal extra damage on their first attack each turn equal to 25% of their base Health and gain Pierce equal to their base Attack.

event.name: Day of Dragons
event.desc: Dragons of 0-2 Delay gain Scorch equal to 20% of their base Health. Dragons of 3-4 Delay gain Regenerate equal to 10% of their base Health plus 4.

event.name: Eagle Eye
event.desc: Each Avian marks a random target upon first activation, Hexing them for 15% of the Avian's base Health. The Avian chooses a new mark when their current mark dies. Ignores Invisibility.

event.name: Energy Ward
event.desc: All Mechas have upgraded their protective protocols, gaining Ward equal to 3 plus 10% of their base Health.

event.name: Elemental Discordance
event.desc: Elementals gain abilities based on faction. Aether gain Barrier 10% plus four of their base Health, Chaos gain Scorch equal to 75% of their base Attack, and Wyld deal extra damage on their first attack each turn equal to 25% of their base Health.

event.name: Goblin's Anarchy
event.desc: Each active Goblin throws a number of bombs equal to their base Attack at the start of each turn before other skills. Each bomb deals 1 damage.

event.name: Undead Vampirism
event.desc: Deals damage to opposing creature and then heals self, even while on delay. Damage and heal are equal to 5% plus 3 of the card’s base Health. This damage cannot be increased.

event.name: Brine Edge
event.desc: Seafolk harness the power of the ocean, increasing their Attack by 15% of their base Health!

event.name: Angelic Assault
event.desc: Angels have transcended, gaining Legion equal to 15% of their base Health.

event.name: Regenerating Carapace
event.desc: Insects are prepared for war, gaining Armor equal to 10% of their base Health, and Regenerate equal to 10% of their base Health.

event.name: Day of Dragons
event.desc: Dragons of 0-2 Delay gain Scorch equal to 20% of their base Health. Dragons of 3-4 Delay gain Regenerate equal to 10% of their base Health plus 4.

event.name: Lily & Spear Formation
event.desc: Frogs deal extra damage on their first attack each turn equal to 25% of their base Health and gain Pierce equal to their base Attack.

event.name: Skydiving Assault
event.desc: Avian of 0-2 delay deal extra damage on their first attack each turn equal to 40% of their base Attack. Avians of 3-4 delay gain Shroud equal to 10% +2 of their base Health.

event.name: Elemental Discordance
event.desc: Elementals gain abilities based on faction. Aether gain Barrier 10% plus four of their base Health, Chaos gain Scorch equal to 75% of their base Attack, and Wyld deal extra damage on their first attack each turn equal to 25% of their base Health.

event.name: Undead Vampirism
event.desc: Deals damage to opposing creature and then heals self, even while on delay. Damage and heal are equal to 5% plus 3 of the card’s base Health. This damage cannot be increased.

event.name: Energy Warding
event.desc: All Mechas have upgraded their protective protocols, gaining Ward equal to 3 plus 10% of their base Health.

event.name: Goblin's Anarchy
event.desc: Each active Goblin throws a number of bombs equal to their base Attack at the start of each turn before other skills. Each bomb deals 1 damage.

event.name: Fear Aura
event.desc: Dragons of 0-2 delay gain Hex equal to 20% of their base Health. Dragons of 3-4 delay gain Weaken equal to 30% of their base Health, and gain Vengeance 8.

event.name: Underwater Shelter
event.desc: Seafolk dive beneath the water's surface, protecting them from harmful attacks while they are on delay!

event.name: Eagle Eye
event.desc: Each Avian marks a random target upon first activation, Hexing them for 15% of the Avian's base Health. The Avian chooses a new mark when their current mark dies. Ignores Invisibility.

event.name: Angelic Assault
event.desc: Angels have transcended, gaining Legion equal to 15% of their base Health.

event.name: Lily & Spear Formation
event.desc: Frogs deal extra damage on their first attack each turn equal to 25% of their base Health and gain Pierce equal to their base Attack.

event.name: Elemental Crux
event.desc: Elementals gain skills based on faction! Aether gain Regenerate, Chaos gain Emberhide, and Wyld gain Corrosive. Skill values are 5 + the card's delay cost.

event.name: Adaptive Weaponry
event.desc: Mechas gain base Ward 3 and other abilities based on faction! Aether also gain Legion 3, Chaos gain Barrage 4, and Wyld gain Venom 3. They add their delay cost to all these values.

event.name: Dawn of Dragons
event.desc: Dragons gain skills based on their Delay (D)! 0D gain Scorch 4, 1D gain Scorch 5, 2D gain Scorch 6, 3D gain Regenerate 8, and 4D gain Regenerate 9.

event.name: Beetleton Mutations
event.desc: Insects are ready to crawl back into the fight! They gain skills based on their Delay (D)! 0D gain Berserk 3, 1D Berserk 4, 2D Berserk 5, 3D Armor 5, 4D Armor 6.

event.name: Goblin's Anarchy
event.desc: Each active Goblin throws a number of bombs equal to their base Attack at the start of each turn before other skills. Each bomb deals 1 damage.

event.name: Eagle Eye
event.desc: Each Avian marks a random target upon first activation, Hexing them for 15% of the Avian's base Health. The Avian chooses a new mark when their current mark dies. This effect ignores Invisibility.

event.name: Undead Vampirism
event.desc: Deals damage to opposing creature and then heals self, even while on delay. Damage and heal are equal to 5% plus 3 of the card’s base Health. This damage cannot be increased.

event.name: Conflicted Ocean
event.desc: All Seafolk gain barrier equal to 20% of their base health. Delay 0-2 Seafolk also deal bonus damage in their first attack equal to 10% of their base health and pierce equal to their base attack.

event.name: Blinding Radiance
event.desc: Terrible light surrounds all Angels! They gain Invisibility 2. Additionally, Delay 0-2 Angels gain Legion Equal to 15% of their base health, while Delay 3 and 4 gain Emberhide 4 and 6 respectively.

event.name: Radioactive Biosteel
event.desc: Mechas developed a toxic offense/defense mechanism! They gain base Regenerate and Ward equal to 15% of their base health and other abilities based on Delay! D0-2 gains Venom 3+Delay, while D3 and 4 get Poisonhide 7 and 9 respectively. Viracocha gains both bonuses.

event.name: Lily & Vampiric Spear Formation
event.desc: Frogs enchanted their spears to deal extra damage on their first attack each turn equal to 25% of their base Health, while also gaining Pierce and Siphon equal to their base Attack!

event.name: Goblin Battle Kit
event.desc: Active goblins throw bombs equal to their base Attack at the start of each turn. Each bomb deals 1 damage and does not benefit from Hex or Venom. They also regenerate 15% of their base health.

event.name: Elemental Discordance
event.desc: Elementals gain skills based on faction and % of base health! Aether gains Barrier 4+15%, Chaos gains Scorch 20% and Wyld deal extra damage on their first attack each turn equal to 30%. Additionally, Void gets a fixed 4 of Venom, 9 Siphon.

event.name: Unbreakable Waves
event.desc: Seafolk gain base Ward and other skills based on Delay! D0-2 gain Frostbreath and D3-4 Armored. Values gained on each skill are based on base health! Ward and Armor 10%, while Frostbreath is 15%.

event.name: Zenith of Dragons
event.desc: The strongest moment of the day for Dragons! 0-2 Delay gain Scorch equal to 25% of their base Health. Dragons of 3-4 Delay gain Regenerate equal to 15% of their base Health plus 4.

event.name: Exalted Warfare
event.desc: Angels are ready for war, gaining Legion 10% and Unrestricted Fervor 10%. Values gained on each skill are based on base health!

event.name: Evil Eye
event.desc: Avians gain skills by base HP and Delay! They all mark a random target upon first activation, ignoring invisibility and hexing them for 15%. The mark lasts until the target dies. 0-2D will Weaken random targets equal to 15%. 3-4D gain Shroud equal to 10%.

event.name: Counterblast Swarm
event.desc: Insects gain Backlash 2. After dealing Attack damage, permanently increases Attack of the lowest Attack active non-tower ally creature by 15% of the Attacker's base Health. Delay 3-4 Insects get Poisonhide equal to 20% of their base health.

event.name: Reinforced Undead Vampirism
event.desc: Vampirism deals damage to opposing creature and then heals self, even while on delay. Damage and heal are equal to 5% + 3 of the card’s base Health. This damage cannot be increased. Undead with 0-2 delay also gain armor equal to 10% of their base health.

event.name: Lily & Spear Formation
event.desc: Frogs deal extra damage on their first attack each turn equal to 25% of their base Health and gain Pierce equal to their base Attack.

event.name: Elemental Disruption
event.desc: Aether gains Barrier 4+15%, Chaos gains Scorch 20%, Wyld deal extra damage on their first attack each turn equal to 30% and Void gains 20% regeneration. All % are based on base health.

event.name: Radioactive Steel
event.desc: Mechas gain Ward equal to 15% of their base health and other abilities based on Delay! D0-2 gains Venom 3+Delay, while D3 and 4 get Poisonhide 7 and 9. Viracocha gains both bonuses.

event.name: Revitalizing Waves
event.desc: Seafolk gain Regenerate and other skills based on Delay! D0-2 gain Frostbreath and D3-4 Armor. Values gained on each skill are equal to 10% of base health!

event.name: Enhanced Battle Kit
event.desc: All goblins gain barrage equal to their base attack, 0-2 Delay goblins gain 15% siphon and 3-4 delay goblins gain 15% ward. Values gained on each skill are based on base health.

event.name: Celestial Voidness
event.desc: All Angels gain barrier 2+15%, 0-2 Delay angel 10% legion and 3-4 delay angel 10% weaken. 0-2 Delay voids gain 3+10% Siphon and 3-4 delay voids gain 3+10% Regenerate. Values gained on each skill are based on base health!.

event.name: Celestial Raid
event.desc: All Angels gain barrier equal to 2 plus 15%, 0-2 Delay angel gain 10% legion and 3-4 delay angel gain 10% weaken. Values gained on each skill are based on base health.

event.name: Deadly Sting
event.desc: 0-2 Delay Insects gain 2+10% venom and 3+20% Pierce and 3-4 delay Insect gain 2+10% corrosive and 2+7% vengeance. Values gained on each skill are based on base health!.

event.name: Flaming Scales
event.desc: All Dragons gain invisibility equal to 3, 0-2 Delay Dragons gain 2 plus 10% scorch and 3-4 delay Dragons gain 15% Emberhide. Values gained on each skill are based on base health.

event.name: Lily & Vampiric Spear Formation Reinforced
event.desc: Frogs deal extra damage on their first attack each turn equal to 25% of their base Health, while also gaining Pierce equal to their base Attack and Siphon as 3 plus their Attack.!

event.name: Sky Destruction
event.desc: All Avians gain 2+delay Vengeance. Avian of 0-2 delay deal extra damage on their first attack each turn equal to 40% of their base Attack. Avians of 3-4 delay gain Shroud equal to 10% +2 of their base Health.

event.name: Reinforced Undead Vampirism
event.desc: All undeads receive Vampirism to 5% + 3. 0-2 delay also gain armor equal to 10%. All values based on Health

event.name: Steel's Edge V2.0
event.desc: All Mechas gain base Ward 3 + Delay, and increase their Attack by 15% of their base Health.

event.name: Thriving Swarm
event.desc: All Insects gain extra Health equal to 10% of their base Health and Swarm equal to 15% of their base health. After dealing Attack damage, Swarm permanently increases the Attack of the weakest ally.

event.name: Goblin Civil War
event.desc: All Goblins gain 10% Armor. Aether gain 7% + Delay Frostbreath, Chaos gain 20% + Delay Barrage, Wyld gain 10% + Delay Venom, Void gain Siphon equal to base Attack. Values are based on base health.

event.name: Elemental Meltdown
event.desc: All Elementals are Enraged for 7% base health. 0-2D gain Weaken and Pierce equal to 15%, and 3-4D Elementals gain Shroud and Vengeance equal to 10% base health.

event.name: Eye of the Maelstrom
event.desc: All Seafolk gain Mark equal to 15% base health. 3-4D Seafolk also gain Regenerate for 15% base health.

event.name: Angels and Demons
event.desc: All Angels gain Vampirism equal to 5% base Health + 2. When an Angel dies it creates a token creature with 75% Attack and Health of the Angel that died. The token has Invisibility and Legion based on its rarity.

event.name: Frog Toxic Barrage
event.desc: All Frogs gain Barrage equal to 30% of their base Health, and Poisonbolt equal to 20% of their base Health.

event.name: Aegis of Dragons
event.desc: All Dragons gain base Ward 3 + Delay, and extra Health equal to 10% of their base Health.

event.name: Beast Mode
event.desc: All Beasts gain Armor, Berserk and Enrage equal to 10% of their base Health.

event.name: Power of Chaos
event.desc: All Chaos gain Enrage equal to 10% of their base Health.

event.name: Growth of Wyld
event.desc: All Wyld gain Berserk equal to 10% of their base Health.

event.name: Order of Aether
event.desc: All Aether gain Armor equal to 10% of their base Health.

event.name: Invisible Mark
event.desc: All Avians gain Mark equal to 15% base health. 2-4D Avians also gain Invisibility equal to Delay minus 1.

event.name: Titanium Ward
event.desc: All Mecha gain 10% Ward. Also, Aether Mecha gain 15% Barrier, Chaos Mecha are Empowered by 15%, and Wyld Mecha are Healed by 15%. Viracocha receives all three. Values are based on base Health. These effects cannot be Nullified.

event.name: Blazing Undead Vampirism
event.desc: All Undead gain Vampirism equal to 10% of their base Health. 0-2D Undead also gain Siphon equal to 20% of their base Health. 3-4D Undead also gain Emberhide equal to 10% of their base Health.

event.name: Universal Toxic Swarm
event.desc: All Insects gain extra Pierce and Swarm equal to 50% of their base Attack, and also gain 15% extra Health. Also, all Poison/Poisonbolt skills for all tribes deal 30% more damage.

event.name: Ascended Elemental Conflux
event.desc: All Elementals gain 10% Shroud. Also, Aether Elementals gain 15% Radiance, Chaos Elementals gain 15% Scorchbreath, Wyld Elementals gain 15% self Invigorate, and Void Elementals gain 15% Devour. Values are based on base Health.

event.name: Cupid's Legions
event.desc: 0-2D Angels gain 15% Legion and 25% Siphon. 3D-4D Angels gain 15% Regenerate and Weaken 99. % values are based on base Health. Also, all Daze skills for all tribes are changed to Heartseeker with the same value.

event.name: Goblin Acid Rain
event.desc: All Goblins gain extra Barrage and Corrosive equal to 15% of their base Health.

event.name: Fury of the Seas
event.desc: All Seafolk gain Maelstrom's Fury equal to 15 minus twice the card Delay.

event.name: Lily & Spear Regenerated
event.desc: Frogs gain Pierce and deal extra damage on their first attack each turn equal to 25% of their base Health. Frogs of 0-2 Delay gain Siphon equal to 25% of their base Health while Frogs of 3-4 Delay gain Regenerate equal to 15% of their base Health.

event.name: Beast Quake
event.desc: All Beasts gain 20% bonus Health, and bonus Berserk and Armor equal to 20% minus twice their delay. All % values based on base Health.

event.name: Winter Engine's Warmth
event.desc: All Mechas gain Ward, Frostbreath, and Scorch equal to 10% of their base Health.

event.name: Invisible Embers
event.desc: All 0-3 Delay Dragons gain 6 Emberhide and all 3-4 Delay Dragons gain Invisibility equal to their Delay.

event.name: Ravenous Raptors
event.desc: All Avians gain Vampirism and deal extra damage on their first attack each turn equal to 10% of their base health.

event.name: Rot and Decay
event.desc: All Undead gain 10% Siphon. Also, 0-2D Undead gain 20% Poison and 3-4D Undead gain 15% Poisonhide. All values based on Health.

event.name: Elemental Tempest
event.desc: Aether Elementals gain 20% Mark. Chaos Elementals gain 20% Barrage. Wyld Elementals gain 15% Venom. Void Elementals gain 10% Backlash. All values are based on base Health.

event.name: Frogs' Devitalizing Touch
event.desc: 0-2D Frogs gain 20% Daze and Weaken. 3-4D Frogs get 15% Ward and Regenerate. All values are based on base Health. All cards are inflicted Weaken 1 every turn.

event.name: Like Moths to a Flame
event.desc: All Insects gain 30% bonus Attack and 10% Vengeance. 0-2D Insects gain 30% Pierce and Siphon, and 15% Scorch Self. 3-4D Insects gain 10% Armor. All values scale with base Health. All cards with Dualstrike have it evolved to Confuse (with the same count).

event.name: Heaven's Unbreakable Ice
event.desc: All Angels gain Frostbreath equal to 50% of their base Attack, along with 10% Corrosive and 15% Barrier scaling with base Health.

event.name: Hidden Beasts
event.desc: All Beasts gain Invisibility 2 and extra Health equal to 20% of their base Health.

event.name: Chilly Boom Brigade
event.desc: All Goblins gain Barrage equal to 30% of their base Health. Freeze targets allied creatures instead of enemies.

event.name: Mecha Meltdown
event.desc: All Mechas gain Ward equal to their Delay + 5, and Scorch equal to 10% of their base Health.

event.name: Toxic Waves
event.desc: All Seafolk gain Poisonhide and Regenerate equal to 15% of their base Health. 0-2D Seafolk also gain Siphon equal to 20% of their base Health. All cards with Empower have it changed to Enrage with the same value.
